Class Schedule Extractor

class ClassScheduleHTMLExtractor.Scraper[source]

A scraper class responsible for scraping exams and course schedule from NTU website.

Variables

  • examURL – URL where the exams information is posted.

  • scheduleURL – URL where the class schedule is posted.

scrapeExams()[source]

Scrapes exams information from the school website and saves it as a html file.

Returns

None

scrapeSchedule()[source]

Scrapes course schedule information from the school website and saves it as a html file.

Returns

None
